thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: Desreen
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by Desreen

author: Desreen
title: Desreen
text: My name is Desreen Williams-Orrett, I have had the absolute pleasure of dealing with Jackie Stanley at the office at Don Mills, and its the very best financial advice I have had to date, I was very depressed and worried about my financial situation and where my life was heading, I used to hide from collection calls, afraid to check my mailbox in fear of getting too many bills/credit card statements....Jackie made me feel comfortable, like I had a purpose, that my debts are not the end of my life, I felt confident like I need to live again, I trusted her completely, while she took care of my proposal, gave me sound financial advice at my follow-up meetings and she followed up with me and on everything she said she would do....I already recommended this company to three other persons. I am confident they will have the awesome experience I had. thank you David Sklar & Associates, Especially Jackie Stanley...I can now live again.
